params.amount: How many $PAPER to send from msg.sender
params.fee: Compulsory fee paid to the sequencer for passing on the message
params.l2Recipient: To which L2 address should we deposit the $PAPER to

params.amount: How many $PAPER were sent from L2
params.l2TxHash: l2 tx_hash for matching txs in ui

deposit(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Function used to bridge $PAPER from L1 to L2

l1Token().notice: The $PAPER ERC20 contract address on L1

l2Bridge().notice: The L2 address of the $PAPER bridge, the counterpart to this contract

starknet().notice: The Starknet Core contract address on L1

withdraw(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Function to process the L2 withdrawal

documentation.text:
Sends a message to an L2 contract.
Returns the hash of the message.

Consumes a message that was sent from an L2 contract.
Returns the hash of the message.
@notice The Starknet Core contract address on L1
@notice The $PAPER ERC20 contract address on L1
@notice The L2 address of the $PAPER bridge, the counterpart to this contract
